intro: Stelis atomacea, commonly known as the miniature stelis, is a rare epiphytic orchid native to the tropical regions of Southeast Asia. It is characterized by its small, delicate flowers that typically bloom in shades of white and pale yellow. The plant has short, compact stems and narrow,革质 (leathery) leaves that help it retain moisture in its natural habitat. It thrives in humid, shaded environments and requires well-draining potting media for optimal growth. Due to its rarity and specific care requirements, it is a sought-after species among orchid enthusiasts.
